tool_description: Sharpe Two long and short volatility signals, with the different data used in our analysis. Visit our website to learn more.
name: Sharpe Two
title: Sharpe Two

api_list.name: Last business date
api_list.description:
Return the last updated date.
Recommended starting point before querying other endpoints.

Expects no parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com/last_business_date/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List tickers
api_list.description:
Return a list of all the ETFs available in the ETFs.
Recommended starting point before querying other endpoints.

Expects no parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com/list_tickers/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List expiration dates
api_list.description:
Return the list of expiration dates associated to a ticker.
Recommended starting point before querying other endpoints.

Expects a ticker.

api_list.name: VIX regime
api_list.description:
Sharpe Two proprietary regimes for the VIX term structure as well as the momentum observed in the US equities (using SPY/QQQ/IWM).

Returns the momentum and the term structure regimes.

Expects no parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com/vix_regime/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com/vix_regime/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharpe-two.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ETF regime
api_list.description:
Sharpe Two proprietary regimes for a given ETF.

Returns the momentum regime and the historical volatility for a given ticker.

Expects a ticker (SPY)

api_list.name: Straddle scored
api_list.description:
Sharpe Two proprietary signals with probability about ATM straddle.

Returns a signal and a probability for a given ticker and expiration.

Expects a ticker (SPY) and an expiration (YYYYMMDD)

api_list.name: Performance six months
api_list.description:
Performance metrics for selling ATM straddle at a given DTE, over the last six months.

Expect a ticker (SPY) and dte (18)

api_list.name: Straddle rank
api_list.description:
Returns ATM straddles prices ranked and z-scored against historical prices, adjusted by DTE (only 15 dte historical prices are used to return the rank and the z-score).

Expects a ticker (SPY) and an expiration (YYYYMMDD)

api_list.name: Performance one year
api_list.description:
Performance metrics for selling ATM straddle at a given DTE, over the last year.

Expect a ticker (SPY) and dte (18)

api_list.name: Variance Premium
api_list.description:
Returns the variance premium as the ratio of the ATM straddle by the subsequent realized movement in the underlying. 
The calculation is days-to-expiration adjusted.

Expects a ticker(QQQ) and an expiration (YYYYMMDD)

api_list.name: Volatility
api_list.description:
Returns historical volatility for a given ticker as well as a VIX like index for implied volatility.
Timeframe available - 1 month and 3 months.

Expects a ticker (QQQ)
